title: Prepaid cards and Online rp purchase
body: Does Prepaid cards give same amount of RP  as buying RP just online by credit cards or paypal? and Im asking for all the priced cards such as $10, 25, 50 {{summoner:31}}

replies.body:
Yup! The prepaid cards will give you the same amount of RP as you'd get paying with PayPal or Credit Card. For those rates, you can check out the Prepaid Cards page:

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/community/prepaid-cards

Let me know if you have any questions!
